ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine I
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows colonists to grow xerigium, a medicinal herb. Allows to build hospital bed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a Meditable to produce Medicine from 'Medical' Flowers and Life Support Systems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine III
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows your colonists to build the laboratory, which can be used to create medkits, and advanced prosthetic body parts. This also allows colonists to construct hospital beds which increase the chance of successful medical work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Medicine IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: This unlocks the organ vat which can be used to turn human corpses into biomatter, and grow replacement organs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cybernetics I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to create in Chemlab new cybernetics body parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cybernetics II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to create in Chemlab additional new cybernetics body parts.
